<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2762</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Book Report Form</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Buch-Report-Formular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forme D'État de Livre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formulário Do Relatório Do Livro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forma Rapporto Del Libro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μορφή εκθέσεων βιβλίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Forma Del Informe Del Libro</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a format including simple guidelines for orgnising thoughts and writing a book report.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Format einschließlich einfache 
Korrekturlinien für orgnising Gedanken und das Schreiben eines 
Buchreports.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un format comprenant les directives simples 
pour des pensées orgnising et écrire un état de livre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um formato including guidelines simples 
para pensamentos orgnising e escrita de um relatório do livro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un formato compreso la guida di 
riferimento semplice per i pensieri orgnising e la scrittura del 
rapporto del libro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια μορφή συμπεριλαμβανομένων των απλών 
οδηγιών για οι σκέψεις και το γράψιμο μιας έκθεσης βιβλίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un formato incluyendo las guías de 
consulta simples para los pensamientos orgnising y escribir un informe
del libro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linguaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scrittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γράψιμο</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
